Firefly.server.killAllFireflyServers¶

Firefly.server.killAllFireflyServers(pid=None)[source]¶

Kill python processes associated with hosting Flask web-servers.

Parameters

pid (int, optional) – process id to kill, defaults to None, killing all processes

Returns

return_code

Return type

int
